items.title: Jim Cramer on International Business Machines: “I Like IBM Very Much”
items.description: International Business Machines Corporation (NYSE:IBM) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. A caller inquired after Cramer’s thoughts on the company, and he replied: “Oh, I like IBM very much. I mentioned Ben Wright earlier. I think that Ben, he’s really turned me on to this stock. We did a very positive piece […]
